devdoc.details: this contract does _not_ work with ERC777 collateral currencies or any others that call into the receiver on transfer(). Using an ERC777 token would allow a user to maliciously grief other participants (while also losing money themselves).

params.refund: refund received in the case that refundOnDispute was enabled.
params.timestamp: timestamp of the price being requested.
